name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Product Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I possess a robust skill set in **Product Management**, **IoT**, **AI**, **RPA**, **BI**, **Big Data**, and various CRM systems including **Salesforce**, **ERP**, **SAP**, and **Oracle**. I excel in analyzing market trends and user feedback to drive product improvements and innovation. My strong leadership and communication skills enable me to lead cross-functional teams effectively while mentoring junior engineers. I am committed to delivering scalable software solutions that enhance user experience and performance, all while adhering to Agile methodologies.

experience.responsibilities:
- Lead product development with a focus on **Data Analysis** and **User Feedback** to enhance cloud-based applications for IoT solutions.
- Utilize **Agile** methodologies to collaborate with cross-functional teams, ensuring timely delivery of features that meet **Market Trends**.
- Implement **Big Data** strategies to analyze user engagement and drive product enhancements, resulting in a **15% increase** in customer satisfaction.
- Direct the integration of **AI** techniques to automate key workflows and improve operational efficiency by **20%**.
- Manage the architecture of **Microservices** using **Java**, and develop REST APIs, optimizing performance leading to a reduced response time of **30%**.
- Spearheaded the development of a hybrid single-page application using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React 17**, and **Redux 4.2.1**, enhancing user experience.
- Improved UI performance by leveraging **React HOC**, **Flux/Redux**, and upgraded to **React Router** version **6** for streamlined navigation.
- Designed and implemented user interfaces using **Angular 14**, **HTML5**, **CSS**, and **Bootstrap**, significantly improving page load times by **25%**.
- Developed backend services with **Core Java**, focusing on **Multithreading**, **Concurrency**, and optimized **Garbage Collection** for better resource management.
- Automated container deployments using **Docker**, and utilized **Jenkins** and **Ansible** for continuous integration and deployment in **production environments**.
- Ensured seamless application performance by working with **Node.js**, **MongoDB**, and setting up staging environments for comprehensive testing.

- Utilize **Product Management** principles to guide the development of new products in the IoT space, leveraging advancements in **AI** and **RPA**.
- Conduct **Data Analysis** to identify **Market Trends** and incorporate **User Feedback** into product development, ensuring alignment with customer needs.
- Collaborate in an **Agile** environment, leading cross-functional teams with a focus on communication and effective project delivery.
- Developed a web application using **React 12** as front-end with robust web APIs, ensuring high-quality data exchange with back-end services.
- Designed and implemented Model View Controller (MVC) architecture using **Spring MVC framework**, including writing **Hibernate** classes for data retrieval and storage.
- Created Reusable Modules and Custom Directives in **Angular 12, 13**, optimizing the application structure for enhanced maintainability.
- Integrated real-time bidirectional communication through **Web Sockets**, enhancing user interactivity and engagement.
- Developed and integrated a comprehensive dashboard using **ChartJS**, implementing authentication protocols with Auth Guards to secure user data.
- Designed dynamic, multi-browser compatible web pages utilizing **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **JavaScript**, **jQuery**, and **AJAX**, ensuring a responsive user experience.

• Led product management initiatives for a variety of technologies, integrating **Salesforce** and **Microsoft Dynamics** for enhanced CRM solutions.  
• Spearheaded the development of IoT and AI-driven applications to support business intelligence (BI) and data analysis strategies, ensuring alignment with evolving market trends.  
• Utilized **Agile** methodologies to streamline project delivery and improve team collaboration, maintaining a focus on user feedback for product improvement.  
• Designed and implemented efficient RPA solutions that enhanced operational productivity by over **30%** across multiple departments.  
• Conducted thorough data analysis leveraging **Big Data** technologies to guide product development cycles and decision-making processes.  
• Collaborated across teams to enhance ERP integrations with **SAP** and **Oracle**, improving information flow and accuracy within business systems.  
• Engaged with stakeholders to gather user feedback, translating insights into actionable product features that increased user satisfaction by **25%**.  
• Managed communication between technical teams and leadership to ensure cohesive project execution and alignment with strategic objectives.
